item.title: Real-Time Alerts That Reach the People Who Can Act
item.description:
Safety isn’t just about reporting — it’s about responding.
AISee sends instant alerts with images to the actual operating staff via WhatsApp or the mobile app.
If someone misses a helmet or enters a restricted zone, supervisors know immediately — with a visual alert they can act on.

This closes the gap between observation and action.
No waiting for reports. No missed incidents.
Just timely information that helps people fix issues right where they happen.
